snippet: European monitors confirmed reports of unmarked military vehicles driving through rebel-held territory over the weekend while Donetsk, the region’s biggest city, endured an artillery battle.
abstract: Shaky cease-fire in eastern Ukraine looks ever more tenuous; European monitors confirm reports of unmarked military vehicles driving through rebel-held territory over the weekend while Donetsk, the region’s biggest city, endures an artillery battle.
lead_paragraph: European monitors confirmed reports of unmarked military vehicles driving through rebel-held territory over the weekend while Donetsk, the region’s biggest city, endured an artillery battle.

headline.main: In Ukraine, Shelling and Convoys of Armed Trucks Threaten Cease-Fire
headline.print_headline: Shelling and Report of Convoys in Ukraine

keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
keywords.name: organizations
